contributionDescription: Contribution can be shown through my activity in Optimism, Of course I want to remain active in this network with many visible benefits. By being active on Web3 especially on the Optimism network This is one of the real contributions I have made and supports many projects that are currently developing
impactDescription: Optimism always has solutions that offer scalability, speed, and lower transaction costs, all of which are critical to the continued growth of the DeFi ecosystem. For this reason, I fully contribute by actively transacting on the Optimism network to advance DeFi projects that support Optimism itself.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Layer 2 Scaling, Smart Contract Platforms, Blockchain Infrastructure, Governance & Tokens
